short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyze Craigslist real estate listings with BNB Analyzer Chrome Extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline your workflow by seamlessly transferring property details from Craigslist into BNB Analyzer with just one click. This extension instantly evaluates whether a property is a viable candidate for a short-term rental business, saving you time and effort.
